ðŸš€ alt-sendme | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Direct, secure, and private file and folder transfer between devices without relying on cloud services.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Peer-to-peer direct transfer â€¢ End-to-end encryption (QUIC + TLS 1.3) â€¢ No accounts or personal info required â€¢ Transfer any file/folder size or format â€¢ Resumable transfers
ðŸ“– Summary: Alt-Sendme is a free, open-source tool for direct peer-to-peer file transfer. It allows users to send any file or folder of any size or format directly between devices without using cloud storage, ensuring end-to-end encryption and privacy.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ deepseek_ocr_app | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Digitizing and extracting text and structured data from scanned documents (images and PDFs) into editable and usable digital formats.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ PDF Processing â€¢ Multi-Format Document Conversion (Markdown, HTML, DOCX, JSON) â€¢ Automatic Image Extraction from PDFs â€¢ Formula & Formatting Preservation â€¢ Image OCR (Plain OCR, Describe, Find, Freeform modes)
ðŸ“– Summary: DeepSeek OCR is a modern web application for Optical Character Recognition, featuring a React frontend and FastAPI backend. It supports processing both individual images and entire multi-page PDF documents, with advanced features like formula and formatting preservation, and allows exporting results into various formats including Markdown, HTML, DOCX, and JSON.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ gobackup | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating scheduled backups of databases and files to cloud storage for application servers.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ No dependencies â€¢ Multiple Databases source support â€¢ Multiple Storage type support â€¢ Archive paths or files into a tar â€¢ Split large backup file into multiple parts
ðŸ“– Summary: GoBackup is a Go-based CLI tool designed for application servers to automate the backup of databases and files. It supports scheduled backups to various cloud storage services, offering features like encryption, compression, and notifications for a low-maintenance, secure backup solution.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ legend | Jinja
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating the generation and management of Grafana dashboards for monitoring services and infrastructure.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Build dashboards for services with prefilled metrics â€¢ Customizable alerts and panels â€¢ Automatic setup of basic alerts with priority and service mapping â€¢ Uniform dashboard layout â€¢ Support for a wide range of components (Airflow, ALB, Kubernetes, MySQL, Nginx, etc.)
ðŸ“– Summary: Legend is a tool that automates the creation and publishing of Grafana dashboards for various services and infrastructure components. It preconfigures metrics and alerts based on established methodologies like USE and RED, simplifying the observability setup for developers.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ beszel | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Self-hosted server and Docker container monitoring with historical data and alerting.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Lightweight and resource-efficient â€¢ Simple setup and configuration â€¢ Docker and Podman container stats (CPU, memory, network) â€¢ Configurable alerts for various system metrics â€¢ Multi-user support with admin sharing
ðŸ“– Summary: Beszel is a lightweight, self-hosted server monitoring platform that collects historical data, tracks Docker container statistics, and provides configurable alerts. It features a user-friendly web interface, supports multi-user and OAuth authentication, and offers automatic backup capabilities.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ nginx-ignition | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Simplifying the management of Nginx web server configurations through a user-friendly graphical interface for developers and enthusiasts.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Virtual host management â€¢ Stream proxying (TCP, UDP, Unix sockets) â€¢ Versatile routing (proxies, redirects, custom code) â€¢ Server configuration tuning â€¢ Automated SSL certificate management (Let's Encrypt)
ðŸ“– Summary: nginx-ignition is a Go-based web UI for managing Nginx configurations, designed for developers and enthusiasts. It simplifies the setup and management of virtual hosts, streams, SSL certificates, and server settings through an intuitive interface, offering both direct Nginx control and configuration file generation.
